4. BEST PRACTICES
 The Building is insured by GSIS.  The Building is installed with fire alarm, fire escapes together with necessary firefighting equipment.  The Building is properly landscaped, maintained and suitably utilized in accordance to its function.  We have approved construction of 2-storey building.
